typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as string,
		delay_code as string,
		delay_code_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFDelay
SFDelay derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		flight_id as integer,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as integer,
		delay_code as string,
		delay_code_name as string,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DelaysToSQL
